headline.main: SENATORS PREDICT LOSSES IN PACIFIC; Connally and George Agree in Warning of Early Reverses Before Final Victory FULL PRODUCTION IS URGED Texan Says Hitler and Japan, Choosing to Live by Sword, 'By Sword Shall Perish'

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 31 -- Senator Connally, chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee, warned the country today that it must steel itself to face the loss of men and materiel before the real fighting strength of the United States could come to its full test.
abstract: U S Sens Connally and George predict early Allied reverses; former holds Manila fall likely
